SEARCH
Package Controller

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
Controller.Transform
public class Transform extends Object
The Transform class represents a data transformation process from a relational database to an ObjectDB database. It extracts specified tables from the relational database, transforms the data, and persists it into an ObjectDB database. The transformation is executed using the provided database name, list of selected tables, and the path to the ObjectDB database file.
Author:
Fernando

      public Transform(String databaseName, List<String> selectedTables)
      Constructs a Transform object with the specified database name and selected tables.
      Parameters:
      databaseName - The name of the relational database.
      selectedTables - The list of tables selected for transformation.

  • Method Details

    • executeTransformation

      public void executeTransformation(String objectDBPath)
      Executes the data transformation process by extracting data from the selected tables in the relational database and persisting it into an ObjectDB database.
      Parameters:
      objectDBPath - The path to the ObjectDB database file.

    • extract_data

      public static <T> List<T> extract_data(Connection connection, String tableName, Class<T> entityClass) throws SQLException
      Extracts data from a specified table in the relational database and maps it to entity objects.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity class.
      Parameters:
      connection - The connection to the relational database.
      tableName - The name of the table to extract data from.
      entityClass - The class representing the entity corresponding to the table.
      Returns:
      A list of entity objects representing the extracted data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during data extraction.

    • persist

      public static <T> void persist(List<T> entities, String objectDBPath)
      Persists (saves) a list of entities into an ObjectDB database at the specified path.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entities.
      Parameters:
      entities - The list of entities to be persisted.
      objectDBPath - The path to the ObjectDB database file.
